More of a remake. It deffinently is based on G1 but many details are changed.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:                                  So
 
 the movie doesn follow the history of G1? or is a remake?
 
 --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
 >
 > It's a totally new take on it. Another new Transformers continuity 
 cannon to except. Just like how all of the following are seperate TF 
 cannons: Marvel Comics U.S.; Marvel Comics UK; American G1, Beast 
 Wars/Machines shows; Japanese G1, Beasties shows; RiD; Armada, 
 Energon, Cybertron etc.
 > 
 > Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:                                  I 
 saw the movie last night.  it was amazingly well done!
 >  I was just wondering if anyone could tell me how the plot fits 
 into
 >  the whole transformers universe (without ruining it for those who
 >  havent seen it)  I saw some things that lead me to believe that 
 they
 >  it takes place at the start of the continium but i thought it also
 >  could be something different altogether.
 >  
 >  On 7/5/07, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
 >  > I want all the toys. I hated the designs at first but after 
 seeing them in
 >  > the film everything looked good. I'd also like a Mikaela aka 
 Megan Fox well
 >  > I'm at it lol.
 >  >
 >  > Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:                                  
 That
 >  > honestly sucks! The movie is so awesome... and all you can do is
 >  >  listen to us saying how insane it is! Only three weeks left, 
 so that
 >  >  should go fast.
 >  >
 >  >  I can only say that I am SOOO getting the Ironhide toy! Pest 
 control lol!
 >  >
 >  >  --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "xochitla2006" <xochitla2006@> 
 wrote:
 >  >  >
 >  >  > No fair that in Mexico we have to wait until July 20th more 
 or less to
 >  >  > watch it...
 >  >  >
 >  >  > BTW Mario, I'm MExican ;)
 >  >  > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Kraftlos <kraftlos@> wrote:
 >  >  > >
 >  >  > > i havent seen it yet, but the trailer came on when i was 
 at Best Buy
 >  >  > > in the plasma hdtv section.  It looked amazing! :-D

 >  >  > > >

 the official
